npcs.name: Ivellios High-hill
npcs.personality: always tries to one-up everyone's stories
npcs.speech_pattern: speaks very loudly, as if everyone is deaf
npcs.voice: sounds like a dramatic Shakespearean actress
npcs.motivation: trying to find their missing family member

members.name: Berris Xiloscient
members.personality: has an excellent memory for faces and names
members.speech_pattern: speaks in a monotone, emotionless voice
members.motivation: saving money to buy their own shop
members.secret: knows the location of a hidden treasure
members.distinctive_feature: has a beauty mark on their face

members.name: Paelynn Nailo
members.speech_pattern: speaks with a thick accent from the countryside
members.voice: sounds like Betty White (sweet but sassy)
members.motivation: saving money to buy their own shop
members.secret: is secretly working for a rival organization
members.distinctive_feature: has a distinctive birthmark on their neck
members.clothing_style: favors dark colors and simple cuts

members.name: Mindartis Meliamne
members.personality: is afraid of their own shadow
members.voice: sounds like a magical construct come to life
members.motivation: saving money to buy their own shop
members.secret: is secretly working for a rival organization
members.distinctive_feature: has a prominent scar across their cheek
members.clothing_style: dresses in layers of mismatched clothing

npcs.name: Halimath Galanodel
npcs.personality: speaks in third person about themselves
npcs.voice: sounds like Kermit the Frog (high-pitched, enthusiastic)
npcs.motivation: saving money to buy their own shop
npcs.secret: witnessed a crime but is too scared to report it
npcs.distinctive_feature: has laugh lines around their eyes
